title: xAI Dev Leaks API Key for Private SpaceX, Tesla LLMs
summary: A employee at Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI leaked a private key on GitHub that for the past two months could have allowed anyone to query private xAI large language models (LLMs) which appear to have been custom made for working with internal data from Musk's companies, including

title: Hacker 'NullBulge' pleads guilty to stealing Disney's Slack data
summary: A California man who used the alias "NullBulge" has pleaded guilty to illegally accessing Disney's internal Slack channels and stealing over 1.1 terabytes of internal company data. [...]

title: Pro-Russia hacktivists bombard Dutch public orgs with DDoS attacks
summary: Russia-aligned hacktivists persistently target key public and private organizations in the Netherlands with distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks, causing access problems and service disruptions. [...]

title: Ukrainian extradited to US for Nefilim ransomware attacks
summary: A Ukrainian national has been extradited from Spain to the United States to face charges over allegedly conducting Nefilim ransomware attacks against companies. [...]

title: Harrods the next UK retailer targeted in a cyberattack
summary: London's iconic department store, Harrods, has confirmed it was targeted in a cyberattack, becoming the third major UK retailer to report cyberattacks in a week following incidents at M&S and the Co-op. [...]

title: Malicious PyPI packages abuse Gmail, websockets to hijack systems
summary: Seven malicious PyPi packages were found using Gmail's SMTP servers and WebSockets for data exfiltration and remote command execution. [...]
